description: Eli Hunter is concerned that his friend, Tom Faulk, has thoughts of having sex with girls. He calls up his horny college buddies Connor Halstead and Jared Summers to help restore Tom’s love for cock. Tom sucks Jared’s big dick and rails Eli’s cute butt in this living room orgy. But was this enough to make Tom realize he is gay? Let’s take a closer look…
title: The Straight Man Part 4
